items.sentence: Have you thought about what time of year you want to visit Boston?
Never in my wildest dreams did I ever think you\'d go out with me.

I don\'t think it\'s a good idea for you to go Boston by yourself.

Tom hopes Mary knows that she has do what John has told her to do.
